answers.answer: Sk I have a similar situation, although it's not my uterus measuring big just my belly.. I'm also 23 weeks but my belly is at 35 cm - going for another ultrasound on the 6th
I'm 32 weeks and I'm measuring 33 1/2my doctor told me it's normal.
My baby measuring big also. He is 2 weeks in advanced of his weight. I am 33 weeks and 4 days pregnant.

I'm 31 weeks and having the exact opposite problem. Measuring small but my doctor said he's just a small baby. Maybe you'll have a larger baby. If you haven't had the test to see if you have gestational diabetes you may want to get it. Women that get gestational diabetes gave larger babies. It's a blood test. They have you drink something wait an hour then take your blood again.

Because of my lmp I'm supposed to be due Sept 2nd so I'm 30 weeks 4days. But BC of the ultrasound they said baby is a weeks small so they change my due date to sept 9. when I go to my appoinments I'm measuring the weeks from my lmp.

1-2 week's is normal because babies grow at different rates. Its likely it will be what it's supposed to in a week or two. Measuring anything over or under three weeks sounds like due date is wrong or something

I've been measuring 2 weeks now 5 weeks difference guess next time I'll go I'll see if he can check I hadn't had a period in a year when I had gotten pregnant so I didn't have anything but my ultrasound to go by

When I went in to my last appt I was supposed to be 34 weeks but measured 37. My ob said it could just mean that baby's big or there could be a lot fluid or could be because way he's laying and could also be that I had a full bladder. My next appt is this Thursday. She said if I measured off again that she will schedule an ultrasound
I hope they schedule an ultrasound I hate not knowing how far I am forsure lol
At 22weeks I was measuring 3weeks ahead and now at 23weeks I'm measuring 5weeks ahead! Got an ultrasound scheduled for 20th July to see his measurements and weight at 25weeks+5 c:

question: Anyone have issues with there baby measuring bigger than due date I'm supposed to be 23 weeks and 3 days when I went to the doctor when he measured my uterus he said I was measuring 29 weeks and we didn't have a period to go off of for an estimate of how far I am
title: measuring big
